text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
I love the _secondary_, _accent_, and _additional_ brand additions. Can we get a black and white field too? Usually brands I work with always have their own black
It would be amazing! A small thing that would improve maintaining the branding :clap:

Light, dark colors would be a great thing!

Colors I'm also including in my Themes are:
Warning, info, success and error... Could imagine I'm not the only one :slightly_smiling_face:
oooo i like that message colors idea
